name: Hermione
text: Ron. You're okay.

name: Harry
text: The dog. Where is it?

name: Ron
text: Harry it's a trap. He's the dog. He's an Animagus.

name: Hermione
text: If you want to kill Harry, you have to kill us too!

name: Sirius
text: No. Only one will die tonight.

name: Harry
text: Then it'll be you!

name: Sirius
text: Are you going to kill me, Harry?

name: Remus
text: Expelliarmus!

name: Remus
text: Well, well, Sirius. Looking rather ragged, aren't we?

name: Remus
text: Finally, the flesh reflects the madness within.

name: Sirius
text: Well, you'd know all about the madness within, wouldn't you Remus?

name: Sirius
text: I found him.

name: Remus
text: I know.

name: Sirius
text: It's him.

name: Remus
text: I understand.

name: Sirius
text: Let's kill him!

name: Hermione
text: No! I trusted you!

name: Hermione
text: And all this time, you've been his friend.

name: Hermione
text: He's a werewolf! That's why he's been missing classes.

name: Remus
text: How long have you known?

name: Hermione
text: Since Professor Snape set the essay.

name: Remus
text: Well, Hermione. You are the brightest witch of your age I've ever met.

name: Sirius
text: Enough talk, Remus! Come on, let's kill him!

name: Remus
text: Wait!

name: Sirius
text: I did my waiting! Twelve years of it! In Azkaban!

name: Remus
text: Very well. Kill him.

name: Remus
text: But wait one more minute. Harry has the right to know why.

name: Harry
text: I know why. You betrayed my parents. You're the reason they're dead!

name: Remus
text: No Harry, it wasn't him. Somebody did betray your parents...

name: Remus
text: somebody who, until quite recently, I believed to be dead!

name: Harry
text: Who was it, then?

name: Sirius
text: Peter Pettigrew!

name: Sirius
text: And he's in this room! Right now!

name: Sirius
text: Come out, come out, Peter!

name: Sirius
text: Come out, come out and play!

name: Snape
text: Expelliarmus!

name: Snape
text: Vengeance is sweet.

name: Snape
text: How I hoped I'd be the one to catch you.

name: Remus
text: Severus

name: Snape
text: I told Dumbledore you were helping a friend into the castle. Here's the proof.

name: Sirius
text: Brilliant, Snape.

name: Sirius
text: You've put your keen mind to the task and come to the wrong conclusion.

name: Sirius
text: If you'll excuse us, Remus and I have business to attend to.

name: Snape
text: Give me a reason. I beg you!

name: Remus
text: Severus. Don't be a fool.

name: Sirius
text: He can't help it. It's habit.

name: Remus
text: Sirius be quiet.

name: Sirius
text: Be quiet yourself!

name: Snape
text: You two, quarrelling like an old married couple.

name: Sirius
text: Why don't you run along and play with your chemistry set!

name: Snape
text: I could do it, you know.

name: Snape
text: But why deny the dementors? They're so longing to see you.

name: Snape
text: Do I detect a flicker of fear? Oh, yes.

name: Snape
text: A Dementor's Kiss. One can only imagine what that must be like.

name: Snape
text: It's said to be nearly unbearable to witness, but I'll do my best.

name: Remus
text: Severus, please.

name: Snape
text: After you.

name: Harry
text: Expelliarmus!

name: Ron
text: Harry! What did you just do?

name: Hermione
text: You attacked a teacher!

name: Harry
text: Tell me about Peter.

name: Remus
text: He was at school with us.

name: Remus
text: We thought he was our friend!

name: Harry
text: No. Pettigrew's dead. You killed him!

name: Remus
text: No, he didn't.

name: Remus
text: I thought so too, until you mentioned Pettigrew on the map!

name: Harry
text: The map was lying, then.

name: Sirius
text: The map never lies!

name: Sirius
text: Pettigrew's alive! And he's right there!

name: Ron
text: Me?! He's mental!

name: Sirius
text: Not you! Your rat!

name: Ron
text: Scabbers has been in my family for

name: Sirius
text: Twelve years?

name: Sirius
text: Curiously long life for a common garden rat!

name: Sirius
text: He's missing a toe, isn't he?

name: Ron
text: So what?

name: Harry
text: All they could find of Pettigrew was his

name: Sirius
text: Finger!

name: Sirius
text: Dirty coward cut it off so everyone would think he was dead!

name: Sirius
text: And then he transformed into a rat!

name: Harry
text: Show me.

name: Harry
text: Give it to him, Ron.

name: Ron
text: What are you trying to do to him?

name: Ron
text: Scabbers!

name: Ron
text: Leave him alone! Get off him! What are you doing?

name: Petter
text: Remus?

name: Petter
text: Sirius.

name: Petter
text: My old friends!

name: Petter
text: Harry! Look at you. You look so much like your father.

name: Petter
text: Like James. We were the best of friends

name: Sirius
text: How dare you speak to Harry!

name: Remus
text: How dare you talk about James in front of him!

name: Remus
text: You sold James and Lily to Voldemort, didn't you!

name: Petter
text: I didn't mean to!

name: Petter
text: The Dark Lord. You have no idea the weapons he possesses!

name: Petter
text: Ask yourself, Sirius! What would you have done?

name: Petter
text: What would you have done?

name: Sirius
text: I would have died, rather than betray my friends!

name: Petter
text: Harry, James wouldn't have wanted me killed!

name: Petter
text: Your dad would have spared me! He would have shown me mercy!

name: Remus
text: Should have realized if Voldemort didn't kill you, we would. Together!
